comment:
"They've recently changed their rates: 
* stories of 600 to 800 words -- $600
* stories of 800 to 1,000 words -- $700
* stories of 1,000 to 1,200 words -- $850
* stories of 1,200 to 1,500 words -- $1,000
* stories of 1,500 to 2,000 words -- $1,400"
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "I was paid $1 a word. Story came out slightly less than assigned length. Great experience."
relationship: Referral (you had a connection who connected you to the editor)
